description: This header file defines functions, data types, and constants related to managing properties within a software component, including initialization, cleanup, retrieval, setting, deletion, and bulk updates of properties stored in memory and potentially persisted. It also declares related enums, such as the setPropRc status codes, and includes licensing and copyright information.

methods.name: initProperties
methods.description: Initializes the properties settings using provided configuration and home directories.

methods.name: destroyProperties
methods.description: Cleans up resources allocated for properties management.

methods.name: restorePropConfig
methods.description: Restores property configuration from a temporary directory to a destination directory, used during RMA/Restore processes.

methods.name: loadGlobalDefaults
methods.description: Loads and applies global default property values from the asset manager (branding).

methods.name: createProperty
methods.description: Creates and optionally copies key/value data into a new property object.

methods.name: getProperty
methods.description: Retrieves a property object for a given key; caller must not free the result if it's non-NULL.

methods.name: setProperty
methods.description: Creates or updates a property value; returns status indicating the result for proper memory management.

methods.name: setPropertyOverwrite
methods.description: Creates or updates a property value, overwriting existing values unconditionally.

methods.name: setPropertiesBulk
methods.description: Applies multiple property updates efficiently in a single operation.

methods.name: deleteProperty
methods.description: Deletes the property associated with a given key.

methods.name: getAllPropertyKeys
methods.description: Returns all property keys and their count; caller must free the returned array and strings.

methods.name: getConfigFileVersion
methods.description: Returns the current version of the property storage file.

methods.name: getPropertyCount
methods.description: Returns the number of properties currently set.

ctags.name: SET_PROP_DROPPED
ctags.pattern: /^    SET_PROP_DROPPED    \/\/ dropped in favor of an existing higher priority property$/
